|brand = D-Link |model = DIR-2660 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = rev A1 |subrevision = (EXO) |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 02/26/2019 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/D-Link_DIR-2660_rev_A1 |wlclass = AC2600 |series = EXO |type = wireless router, wireless system |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = KA2IR2660A1 |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = AP-MTKH7 |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = MediaTek;MT7621AT;MT7621AT, 1750-AMTH, CTPGAH82, DTPGRW55; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = MIPS 1004Kc |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 880 <!-- 880 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = 16-bit
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Winbond;W29N01HVSINA; |flash1size = 128 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 256 |ram1chip = Micron;MT41K128M16JT-125:K; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw_cpu = true |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = USB 3.0, USB 2.0 |exp_usb_num = 2 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 2.5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Wave2, MU-MIMO, 256QAM, Google Assistant, Alexa, Internet Speed Test, |addchip = 5GHz RF Front End Module;Qorvo (RFMD);RFFM4552;Q, 4552, XQxx;4; |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = 192.168.0.1 |defaultlogin = Admin |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = dlink-XXXX |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = SGE (T&W) |manuf_model = AP-MTKH7 |manuf_rev = -002 REV1.0 |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = OpenWrt
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 02/25/2019 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = MediaTek;MT7615N;ARM, MT7615N, 1745-BFAL, ACMS9A89; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 4 |rad1rxchains = 4 |rad1sstreams = 4 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam1 = 800 |rad1n = 600 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = MediaTek;MT7615N;ARM, MT7615N, 1745-BFAL, ACMS9A89; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad2txchains = 4 |rad2rxchains = 4 |rad2sstreams = 4 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad2ac = 1733 |nqam2 = 800 |rad2n = 600 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== *Web GUI: http://dlinkrouter.local./
"AP-MTKH7-002 REV1.0" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :Same board layout as the: * [[D-Link DIR-1760 rev A1]] / [[D-Link DIR-1960 rev A1]] / [[D-Link DIR-2640 rev A1]] * [[D-Link DIR-882 rev A1]] / [[D-Link DIR-878 rev A1]] / [[D-Link DIR-867 rev A1]] * [[Motorola MR2600]]
The identifier on each of the four [[Qorvo]] RFFM4552 5GHz RF FEMs is different which likely just means that they came from a slightly different batch. They are: XQNV, XQ8R, XQFK, and XQFP
"D9PTK" [https://www.micron.com/support/tools-and-utilities/fbga?fbga=D9PTK FBGA code] on the RAM corresponds to the MT41K128M16JT-125:K
{{seealso|D-Link EXO series}}
==Links of Interest== ===News=== * [https://www.dlink.com/en/latest-news/d-link-introduces-new-exo-router-series-with-mcafee-protection ''D-Link Introduces New Exo Router Series with McAfee Protection'' on '''D-Link''']
